propel.core.functional.closure
Class SharedClosureVariableWrapper<T>

java.lang.Object
  propel.core.functional.closure.SharedClosureVariableWrapper<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the object being wrapped
public class SharedClosureVariableWrapper<T>
extends java.lang.Object

A thread-safe object wrapper that can be used for capturing values used across multiple closure constructs e.g. when using multiple anonymous classes. A wrapper is needed because these objects must be declared final, otherwise cannot be shared as such.
